disappointing.英释: not as good as you hoped or expected

authoritative.英释: an authoritative book, account etc is respected because the person who wrote it knows a lot about the subject

psychological.英释: relating to the way that your mind works and the way that this affects your behaviour

sophisticated.英释: a sophisticated machine, system, method etc is very well designed and very advanced, and often works in a complicated way

extraordinary.英释: very much greater or more impressive than usual

establishment.英释: the act of starting an organization, relationship, or system

entertainment.英释: things such as films, television, performances etc that are intended to amuse or interest people

misunderstand.英释: to fail to understand someone or something correctly

fundamentally.英释: in every way that is important or basic

confrontation.英释: a situation in which there is a lot of angry disagreement between two people or groups

determination.英释: the quality of trying to do something even when it is difficult

inappropriate.英释: not suitable or right for a particular purpose or in a particular situation

qualification.英释: if you have a qualification, you have passed an examination or course to show you have a particular level of skill or knowledge in a subject

concentration.英释: a large amount of something in a particular place or among particular people

indispensable.英释: someone or something that is indispensable is so important or useful that it is impossible to manage without them

comprehensive.英释: including all the necessary facts, details, or problems that need to be dealt with

multicultural.英释: involving or including people or ideas from many different countries, races, or religions

semiconductor.英释: a substance, such as  silicon  , that allows some electric currents to pass through it, and is used in electronic equipment

controversial.中释: 引起争论的， 有争议的
controversial.英释: causing a lot of disagreement, because many people have strong opinions about the subject being discussed

contradiction.中释: 矛盾， 不一致； 否认， 反驳
contradiction.英释: a difference between two statements, beliefs, or ideas about something that means they cannot both be true

unfortunately.英释: used when you are mentioning a fact that you wish was not true

heterogeneity.中释: 异种， 异质， 不同成分

developmental.英释: relating to the development of someone or something

accommodation.英释: a place for someone to stay, live, or work

collaborative.中释: 合作的， 协作的， 协力完成的
collaborative.英释: A collaborative piece of work is done by two or more people or groups working together

understanding.中释: 理解，理解力；谅解；协议；相互理解，融洽

biotechnology.英释: the use of living things such as cells,  bacteria  etc to make drugs, destroy waste matter etc

advertisement.中释: 广告， 公告， 登广告； 广告活动， 宣传
advertisement.英释: a picture, set of words, or a short film, which is intended to persuade people to buy a product or use a service, or that gives information about a job that is available, an event that is going to happen etc

neighbourhood.中释: 四邻； 附近； 接近
neighbourhood.英释: the area around you or around a particular place, or the people who live there

consideration.中释: 考虑， 思考， 要考虑的事； 体贴， 关心
consideration.英释: careful thought and attention, especially before making an official or important decision

industrialize.英释: When a country industrializes or is industrialized, it develops a lot of industries

correspondent.英释: someone who is employed by a newspaper or a television station etc to report news from a particular area or on a particular subject

communication.中释: 通讯， 交流， 交际； 通信工具， 交通联系
communication.英释: the process by which people exchange information or express their thoughts and feelings

undergraduate.英释: a student at college or university, who is working for their first degree

misconception.英释: an idea which is wrong or untrue, but which people believe because they do not understand the subject properly

comprehension.中释: 理解， 理解力， 领悟； 理解力测验

revolutionary.英释: someone who joins in or supports a political or social revolution

corresponding.英释: caused by or connected with something you have already mentioned

Mediterranean.英释: relating to the Mediterranean Sea, or typical of the area of southern Europe around it

circumference.英释: the distance or measurement around the outside of a circle or any round shape

pronunciation.英释: the way in which a language or a particular word is pronounced

international.英释: relating to or involving more than one nation

granddaughter.英释: the daughter of your son or daughter

investigation.英释: an official attempt to find out the truth about or the cause of something such as a crime, accident, or scientific problem
